Key Match Events: The Suns dropped their fourth consecutive contest last night against the Indiana Pacers by a score of 126-108.
Post-Match Reflections: Bradley Beal expressed frustration about the Suns' recent losses, stating, 'We're definitely pissed off. We're not happy about it.'

Devin Booker acknowledged the team's struggles but remained hopeful, saying, 'The vibes are low, man. We're just have to keep fighting. It's a blessing to even be in this position, but our output is super ugly right now.'
